name: INNER ROTATION
description:
In a very distant future, two scientists find themselves in an alien environment observation craft heading for Earth. Both were chosen for this purpose from a young age, and finally, they return home to deliver the data collected during the last years and get recognition for it.

After performing routine activities, one of them realizes that she has not seen her companion anywhere and looking for her among the ship she begins to realize that something is not quite right. After getting a telecom and contacting her, they realize that reality is distorting around the ship.

Our protagonist must find her companion and find her way back home from a new reality where her memories and imagination have begun to mix with the tangible. 

INNER ROTATION is a puzzle and platform game where the player will gradually gain agency over the world and will be able to alter its perspective and physics, being able to rotate the stage and interact in different ways with the objects around him while exploring a variety of non eucledean enviroments.

CREDITS
